title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Endangered Species
body: Materials For Loan - Endangered Species       Saving an Endangered Butterfly: A teachers guide to leading a hike in Miller Woods at the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore.  The careful studies of the endangered Karner Blue Butterflies' life cycle have helped park rangers develop a plan for its survival. This guide contains activities that relate to this theme. Contact the park's education specialist at (219) 395-1885 for more information on this guide.
